The three contained maps here represent simplifed 100x100 grid aperture maps.

PARALELL-PLATE-01VOX.TXT and PARALELL-PLATE-10VOX.TXT are uniform and can serve as test cases to manual validation if desired. 

PARALELL-PLATE-10VOX-0AP-BANDS.TXT has several horizontal and vertical bands of zero aperture and requires use of the 'LOW-MASK' parameter
